vīmaṃsati：vīmaṃseti [Sk．mīmāṃsate．man の desid．] 思察す，考察す，審察す．ppr．vīmaṃsamāna； caus．vīmaṃsāpeti 考察さす．
vīmaṃsati：[mān + sa ； mā is doubled and the first mā is changed to vī； the second mā is shortened] investigates； tests； considers．
vīmaṃsati：To think over，consider，reflect upon； to examine，investigate，try，test

vīmaṃsati：ဝီမံသတိ （ဝိကတိ√မန်）
စုံစမ်း၏။ စူးစမ်းဆင်ခြင်၏။
